column1: Getting regular exercise benefits your health in many ways: - Strengthens your heart and lungs - Lowers your risk for heart disease and stroke - Strengthens and tones your muscles - Lowers blood pressure and cholesterol levels - Helps you lose extra pounds - Improves sleep - Relieves stress - Improves balance - May help prevent certain cancers - May help slow bone loss
Softball, basketball, hockey, and soccer aren't just for kids.
